name: unity-mcp-server
description: MCP skill for interacting with the Unity Editor through the Unity MCP Server. Provides tools for scene creation, GameObject manipulation, script generation, and project inspection.
author: Ozymandros
instructions: This skill exposes tools provided by the Unity MCP Server.
Always use the defined MCP tools to interact with Unity.
Do not attempt to execute Unity C# code directly; use the tools instead.
All Unity operations are executed on the main thread via the server dispatcher.
If a tool requires parameters, follow the input schema exactly.

tools.name: ping
tools.description: Checks connectivity with the Unity MCP Server.

tools.name: create_gameobject
tools.description: Creates a GameObject in the active scene.

tools.name: get_scene_info
tools.description: Returns information about the currently active scene.

tools.name: create_script
tools.description: Generates a C# script file inside the Unity project.

examples.user: Create a new scene named TestScene
Add a cube to the scene
